newsitem.title: USA: TCF extends Winthrop note deadline.
newsitem.headline: TCF extends Winthrop note deadline.

text.p: TCF Financial Corp said Tuesday it had extended to June 30 its solicitation of consents from holders of Winthrop Resources Corp's 9.50 percent senior notes due 2003.
The expiration date was previously June 23.

As part of its proposed merger with Winthrop, TCF agreed to become co-obligor on the notes if a majority of the $28.75 million principal amount of outstanding notes consented to the elimination of certain covenants.
TCF said it expects to complete the merger today, pending approval by shareholders of both companies.
